ValidationRule.description: Comments box must be filled out for Expenses & Other "Type of Refund"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (RecordType.Name = "Bank Transfer" || RecordType.Name = "Card Refund" || RecordType.Name = "Paypal") && (ISPICKVAL( Type_of_Refund__c , "Expenses") || ISPICKVAL( Type_of_Refund__c , "Other (Please Explain in Comments)")) && ISBLANK(Comments__c)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the description of refund into the Comments box
